prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all facial features, eyes, lips, expression unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. ADD: A few small red foil hearts placed on the face — scattered naturally, realistic metallic reflections. BACKGROUND: Clean beautiful white. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus. Original dimensions.
